ovdesc.p: This is the table in which the list of tenant types can be defined

desc.p: Unique reference to indentify each tenant type.
The tenant type name can be decided based on usage/type of t24instance for e.g DEMO, LIVE(PRODUCTION), TRAINING, UAT etc
Specifies the description of the tenant type.
Specifies the group under which the tenant type can be categorized
1. LIVE - Indicates the t24 instance(tenant system) used is a LIVE or PRODUCTION system.
2. NON-LIVE - Indicates the t24 instance(tenant system) is used for other purposes like DEMO, UAT, TRAINING etc.
